name: Conbat
description:
A tower defense/top-down shooter game, where you can only use console commands (and a few bindable keys) to defend your computer from bugs.

This is a submission to the Wowie Jam 4.0, the theme was "Collaborate with AI". In this game you collaborate with AI in a sense that you can't do anything without the computer (the """ai""") and the computer can't do anything without you.

Type 'shake' to toggle screen shake.

Huge thanks to dnesov, Atron, ReOne and Paulsams for feedback during development!

This project uses the Cascadia Code font, which is licensed under the SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE v1.1
